activities_tenant_select.name: activities_tenant_select
activities_tenant_select.using:
EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM tickets 
    WHERE tickets.id = ticket_activities.ticket_id 
    AND tickets.organization_id = current_setting('app.current_org_id', true)::uuid
  )

activities_tenant_insert.name: activities_tenant_insert
